Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Montana’s death penalty is broken beyond repair. It’s time for our legislators to abolish capital punishment in Montana.

Our lawmakers have an opportunity to advance HB 350, which would repeal capital punishment and replace it with a sentence of life in prison without the possibility of parole.

HB 350 will not advance without your voice. Tell your legislator to support HB 350 and bring Montana’s capital punishment era to an end.

Thanks for sticking with us,

ACLU of Montana
